ComicInfo.Summary:
G.I. Joe's subterranean mission takes a turn for the worse after the team is attacked by one of their own! Meanwhile, back in their underground base, Scarlett's command is challenged and a long-simmering rivalry boils to a head! Plus: Monsters, explosions, jokes and more in The Crown Jewel of the Hasbro universe!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Aaron Conley (a) & Jean-Francois Beaulieu (c) | 1 | Sub-A | Subscription Cover A | Giannis Milonogiannis | 2 | Sub-B | Subscription Cover B | Drew Johnson (a) & David Garcia Cruz (c) | 3 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Ed Luce | 4 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-10 14:08:12. [CVDB606329]

ComicInfo.Characters: Agent Helix, Baroness, Doc, Duke, Polly, Quick-Kick, Roadblock, Rock & Roll, Salvo, Scarlett, Shipwreck, Skywarp, Snake Eyes, Spirit, Tunnel Rat
